JobDescription.Description: As a React Developer, I am responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js workflows. I am working closely with the product and design teams to ensure that all user-facing features are both visually appealing and highly functional
Responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features using React.js
Collaborate with product and design teams to ensure the best possible user experience
Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code
Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
Write high-quality, well-documented code that is maintainable and easy to understand
Work with the back-end team to integrate front-end components with back-end APIs

JobDescription.Description: I am working as a software engineer and I am playing the role of team lead for the current project our company have. I am playing the lead role here and managing the project for getting the result we want. As a engineer I am playing the full stack role working in frontend backend both side to ensure the best quality of our product.
Responsibilities: Manage our internal developer team for running the project.
Testing the application and debugging the issue.
Developing new features for the application that can help our clients to use our application effectively.
Collaborate with product and design teams to ensure the best possible user experience
Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
Develop the back-end to integrate front-end components.

JobDescription.Description: Programming Hero is an online-based learning platform that helps passionate developers to achieve their goals. Apart from teaching, Programming through our app and web courses, we're evolving and empowering Companies to find and connect with excellent Web-Developers to build a great team globally.
Responsibilities: Building network worldwide and exploring web developing opportunities
Connection bridge from students to authority
Solving student's issues in different aspects
It is placing individual candidates for the job that correctly matches to build their career path.
Connecting companies with the top talents who have finished our courses with excellency
Marketing the company's image to clients and the general people through my content
Connecting companies with the top talents who have finished our courses with excellency
Planning new features and ideas for teams well-being
Working with alumni students and solving their issues
